text.text:
Apply to Drive

Sign up here, then download the Fahr mobile application to get started.

text_1853810290.jcr:title: Text Input
text_1853810290.constraintMessage: Needs to be a phone number, yo!
text_1853810290.name: phonenumber
text_1853810290.requiredMessage: You need to give us your phone number, yo!

item0.text: I agree to the Fahr ToS

text_1123801798.text: Haven't gotten a response yet? Send us a carrier pigeon to find out what happened.

text.text:
Don’t know how to drive?

Don't worry, we'll teach you!

text_130494129.text:
Learn to Drive

We need drivers, so we'll pay for you to learn how to drive

text_670131074.text:
Earn while you Learn

Start making money before you even have your license

text_930726409.text:
No Liability

Any damage you do while learning is covered by a legal loophole

text_302339165.text:
There's no reason you should have to wait until you're qualified before you start carrying paying passengers.

Learn more

text.text:
How Fahr Will You Go?

Fahr is a mobile app that connects passengers to people we legally can't refer to as drivers.

You won't get rich operating our vehicles, but you might be able to at least catch up on rent!

text_1506270926.text:
Name Your Own Price

There is no standardized pricing for Fahr rides. Charge your passengers whatever you'd like.

text_1588397428.text:
No Rules

You're truly your own boss when you drive Fahr. The company provides zero supervision.

text_939199664.text:
Meet Interesting People

It isn't like you have anyone else to talk to, is it?

text.text:
Get Fahr Away

When you drive for Fahr, you won't have to worry about accidents or insurance. That's because our drivers are trained to wear disguises and flee the scene of any accident. That keeps our costs low and our employees out prison.

text_979717126.text:
Not a Popularity Contest

We don't care how much your passengers like you, or how much you like your passengers. Ratings don't matter here.

text.text:
FA(hr)Q

  • What does Fahr mean?

    Nobody knows. We found the word inscribed on a golden tablet buried in the desert and decided to roll with it.

  • Where's my money?

    Due to ongoing legal challenges to our operations, we can only provide payment to our employees in the form of Fahrbux, a proprietary cryptocurrency accepted at our online company store.

  • Is Fahr a real company?

    Hmm?

  • Can anyone drive for Fahr?

    If you're not sure whether you're qualified to drive for Fahr, see our Driver Qualification Page.

See our help page for more information.
